Class ChatBase

java.lang.Object
zombie.chat.ChatBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminChat, FactionChat, GeneralChat, RangeBasedChat, SafehouseChat, ServerChat, WhisperChat
public abstract class ChatBase extends Object
